summary: Mini smelter that you can summon anywhere you desire. Equip the summon ring. NOT A MAGIC SPELL! It's a one time use version, Will Remove itself after unequipped. You can make more at the forge 2Dwarven ingots 2Silver ingots and a filled lesser soul gem. Ring dosn't take up an equipment slot when equipped. Banish from anywhere no need to stay by it
descriptionHtml:
This is a working mod that has been polished off by yours truly Lykaios Skoll Managarmr. It works just like a regular smelter, but can be placed anywhere you need one. It's 33% smaller than a regular one with no coal on the side. The silver textures on the smelter are from DarkFox127 Carinither Tower Mod. I got permission to use them. I always needed a smelter in places that didn't have one without a ton of different mods. I also needed this for a massive mod I'm working on, but figured I'd release it early lolol... Any problems please feel free and let me know...

I can make this smelter do just about anything you would want including making it movable/permanent so you could place them anywhere and leave them there. I've created a ton of scripts for this already that take care of anything you could pritty much want to do with this smelter. Just ask...
author: Lykaios
